title: How do I edit a photo or video or add a photo frame?
answer:
To edit a photo, touch the menu key. You will then be able to rotate (left or right) or edit the photo, as shown in the following figure. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112771)

 Videos cannot be edited. 

 To add a photo frame, touch the menu key, and choose Edit from the displayed option menu. On the Edit screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112772) to select a photo frame. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112773)
